body.p: The editor pane, or simply the editor, is where you edit your documents opened or created by the . You know the document is associated with from the special icon displayed in the editor title bar which has the same graphic pattern painted with different colors for different types of documents.

This pane has three different modes of displaying and editing the content of a document available as different tabs at the bottom left margin of the editor panel: Text mode, Grid Mode, Author mode (CSS based tag-less editor).
